verses.verse: Now these are the nations<WH1471> which the LORD<WH3068> left<WH3240>, to prove<WH5254> Israel<WH3478> by them, even as many of Israel as had not known<WH3045> all the wars<WH4421> of Canaan<WH3667>;

¶ And after<WH310> him was Shamgar<WH8044> the son<WH1121> of Anath<WH6067>, which slew<WH5221> of the Philistines<WH6430> six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> men<WH376> with an ox<WH1241> goad<WH4451>: and he also delivered<WH3467> Israel<WH3478>.
